title: Investigate Cause of Widespread Air Quality Alert
description: A sudden, city-wide drop in air quality is detected. An operator must investigate the cause, suspecting a regional event like a wildfire.

tasks.description: Acknowledge simultaneous 'Poor Air Quality' alerts from sensors across the entire city.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recognizes the event is widespread, not localized.

tasks.description: Query external data sources, such as satellite imagery and regional wildfire maps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pulls in data from third-party systems.

tasks.description: Correlate the air quality drop with a large wildfire burning in a neighboring state, identifying smoke drift as the root cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly diagnoses the cause of the air quality issue.
